name: Veggie Salad with Broccoli and Mushrooms
description: This veggie salad with broccoli and mushrooms is easy to make, super delicious and most of all incredibly healthy! It's best with a creamy tahini dressing!

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pot, bring some water to boil and cook the broccoli for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pot, bring some water to boil and cook the broccoli for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the tahini dressing. Put all ingredients in a blender or food processor and blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the tahini dressing. Put all ingredients in a blender or food processor and blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients for the salad and stir in the tahini dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients for the salad and stir in the tahini dressing.
